author: dreid
msg: This is the next step in the conversion of socket address functions to
take APR_LOCAL/APR_REMOTE and also the addition of a new function to get the
apr_inaddr_t for a socket.  the new function is needed to help tidy up

author: wrowe
msg: Fixes most of the Unicode problems for Win9x, and expands the effective
path lengths for NT volumes beyond MAX_PATH.  More patches to come, this
one doesn't work in my canonical-overhaul tree, your results may vary.
